intro: Notocles, commonly known as the silverleaf tree, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its silver-gray leaves that are covered in fine hairs, giving it a distinctive appearance. The plant is native to parts of Africa, Asia, and Australia, and it thrives in arid or semi-arid environments. Notocles species typically produce small, woolly flowers that are often pale in color. These plants are sometimes used in traditional medicine for their purported health benefits.
